question: Which union ministry has signed MoU with CSIR for cooperation in research and education?
option2: Ministry of Women and Child Development
explanation: The Ministry of AYUSH has recently signed a MoU with Council of Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR â€“New Delhi) for cooperation in research and education in areas of traditional systems of medicine and its integration with modern science. Under the MoU, both organizations shall jointly endeavor to pursue:  R&D covering fundamental research; AYUSH specific diagnostic tools; linking microbiome, gene expression and prakriti; multi-ingredient herbal formulations, including their standardization; exploring modern scientific methods for integration with traditional Indian Systems of Medicine (ISM); linking disease signatures, etc.
